channel.title: How to insert link on value ina Pivot result
channel.description: Hello there is the possibility of creating a pivot in redash and then being able to make the cells of the pivot clickable (link) to open a detail view (another view in redash) with the parameters of the value of the clicked cell passed to the second view? Thanks to the availability Alessio

item.description:
Hello there is the possibility of creating a pivot in redash and then being able to make the cells of the pivot clickable (link) to open a detail view (another view in redash) with the parameters of the value of the clicked cell passed to the second view?
